attributes.action: put 2 road crossings near to Notre Dame High School, Sheffield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently a student was knocked down near Notre Dame High School, Sheffield. We want 2 new road crossings e.g. traffic lights. One near the main entrance, one near the Oakbrook entrance. Please sign our petition. Thanks Student Movement for Change (SMfC)
